channel.title: investments on deskriders

item.title: Real Estate vs Stock Market
item.description: I selected IYR (as Real Estate proxy) and SPY and compare them over the last 24 years. This is expected but surprising to see the performance from 2001 - to date. As seen in the bottom chart, the stock market just managed to rise above the Real Estate returns. SPY (571%) vs IYR (549%) But the picture changes if we start a little later. Here is the comparison every 4 years from 2001.
